        Creates a new builder instance for a me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.

      • show

        protected void show(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                    long tabListRemoveTicks)
        Shows this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc to a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to show this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc to.
        plugin - The plugin requesting the change.
        tabListRemoveTicks - The ticks before removing the player from the player list after spawning. A negative value indicates that this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc shouldn't get removed from the player list.

      • hide

        protected void hide(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin,
                    PlayerNPCHideEvent.Reason reason)
        Hides this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc from a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to hide the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc for.
        plugin - The plugin requesting the change.
        reason - The reason why the me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc was hidden for the player.

      • getExcludedPlayers

        public java.util.Collection<org.bukkit.entity.Player> getExcludedPlayers()
        A modifiable collection of all players which are not allowed to see this player. Modifications to the returned collection should be done using addExcludedPlayer(Player) and removeExcludedPlayer(Player).
        Returns:
        a collection of all players which are explicitly excluded from seeing this NPC.

        Returns:

      • getGameProfile

        public com.comphenix.protocol.wrappers.WrappedGameProfile getGameProfile()
        Get the protocol lib NPCProfile wrapper for this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc. To use this method ProtocolLib is needed as a dependency of your project. If you don't want to do that, use getProfile() instead.
        Returns:
        the protocol lib NPCProfile wrapper for this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc

      • getProfile

        public NPCProfile getProfile()
        The NPCProfile of this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc. The returned NPCProfile is mutable, however this has no effect to this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.
        Returns:
        The NPCProfile of this me.kapdor.rpmodule.api.npc.
        Since:
        2.5-SNAPSHOT
